concept.title: Expression Output Field
concept.shortdesc: When you configure an expression, the Expression <<whatever>> writes the results of the expression to a field. You can use an existing field or create a new field.

conbody.p: When you use an existing field, the Expression <<whatever>> replaces the incoming value with the new value. When you use a new field, the Expression <<whatever>> adds the new field to the record and passes the value of the expression.
